first.name: Harriet
first.content: That's the last of the rabbits, Trailmaster.

grass_1_end_harriet_2.name: Harriet
grass_1_end_harriet_2.content: Did you get the news, though? Apparently there's some operational difficulties back at base, and there's not going to be any work for us for awhile.

grass_1_end_harold_1.name: Harold
grass_1_end_harold_1.content: What? But this work is so profitable, how could there not be work for us?

grass_1_end_harriet_3.name: Harriet
grass_1_end_harriet_3.content: Seems like they just ran out of time to line up more work. Maybe things will be resolved at some point in the near future.

grass_1_end_harold_2.name: Harold
grass_1_end_harold_2.content: Hopefully. I do enjoy being able to collect a paycheck...
